title: SOLD VIA EBAY - Chas Bennett N28 Allen & Ginter - SGC 50 VGEX
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SOLD VIA EBAY - Chas Bennett N28 Allen & Ginter - SGC 50 VGEX
posts.post_content:
SOLD VIA EBAY

Just got this back from SGC a few days ago. Chas Bennett N28 Allen & Ginter's graded VGEX SGC 50.

Card is in very nice shape with little wear. 

Two PSA 4s sold on eBay recently - one for $330.00 and one for $256.00. I see no record for an SGC 50.

I am asking [STRIKE]$275.00[/STRIKE] $250.00 for mine via PPFF. Looking to move this relatively quickly to pick up some other cards so if it does not move here, I will be listing it on eBay within a day or so.

Price bump - one-time bump down to $250.00. Otherwise sending to eBay tonight (2/24). 

Thanks
